ud2.8:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kuṇḍikāyaṃ viharati kuṇḍadhānavane.
ud2.8:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena suppavāsā koliyadhītā satta vassāni gabbhaṃ dhāreti.
ud2.8:3.4: Sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā sā dukkhāhi tibbāhi kharāhi kaṭukāhi vedanāhi phuṭṭhā tīhi vitakkehi adhivāseti:
ud2.8:3.5: “sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti;
ud2.8:3.6: suppaṭipanno vata tassa bhagavato sāvakasaṃgho yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno;
ud2.8:3.7: susukhaṃ vata taṃ nibbānaṃ yatthidaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ na saṃvijjatī”ti.
ud2.8:4.1: Atha kho suppavāsā koliyadhītā sāmikaṃ āmantesi:
ud2.8:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi;
ud2.8:4.4: appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha:
ud2.8:4.5: ‘suppavāsā, bhante, koliyadhītā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati;
ud2.8:4.6: appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī’ti.
ud2.8:4.8: ‘suppavāsā, bhante, koliyadhītā satta vassāni gabbhaṃ dhāreti.
ud2.8:4.9: Sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā sā dukkhāhi tibbāhi kharāhi kaṭukāhi vedanāhi phuṭṭhā tīhi vitakkehi adhivāseti—
ud2.8:4.10: sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti;
ud2.8:4.11: suppaṭipanno vata tassa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno;
ud2.8:4.12: susukhaṃ vata taṃ nibbānaṃ yatthidaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ na saṃvijjatī’”ti.
ud2.8:5.1: “Paraman”ti kho so koliyaputto suppavāsāya koliyadhītāya paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud2.8:5.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho koliyaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud2.8:5.4: “suppavāsā, bhante, koliyadhītā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati, appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchati;
ud2.8:5.6: ‘suppavāsā, bhante, koliyadhītā satta vassāni gabbhaṃ dhāreti.
ud2.8:5.7: Sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā sā dukkhāhi tibbāhi kharāhi kaṭukāhi vedanāhi phuṭṭhā tīhi vitakkehi adhivāseti—
ud2.8:5.8: sammāsambuddho vata so bhagavā yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya dhammaṃ deseti;
ud2.8:5.9: suppaṭipanno vata tassa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho yo imassa evarūpassa dukkhassa pahānāya paṭipanno;
ud2.8:5.10: susukhaṃ vata nibbānaṃ yatthidaṃ evarūpaṃ dukkhaṃ na saṃvijjatī’”ti.
ud2.8:6.3: Saha vacanā ca pana bhagavato suppavāsā koliyadhītā sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyi.
ud2.8:7.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so koliyaputto bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā yena sakaṃ gharaṃ tena paccāyāsi.
ud2.8:7.2: Addasā kho so koliyaputto suppavāsaṃ koliyadhītaraṃ sukhiniṃ arogaṃ arogaṃ puttaṃ vijātaṃ.
ud2.8:7.4: “acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho, tathāgatassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā, yatra hi nāmāyaṃ suppavāsā koliyadhītā saha vacanā ca pana bhagavato sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijāyissatī”ti.
ud2.8:8.1: Atha kho suppavāsā koliyadhītā sāmikaṃ āmantesi:
ud2.8:8.3: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi:
ud2.8:8.4: ‘suppavāsā, bhante, koliyadhītā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī’ti;
ud2.8:8.6: ‘suppavāsā, bhante, koliyadhītā satta vassāni gabbhaṃ dhāreti.
ud2.8:8.7: Sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā sā etarahi sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijātā.
ud2.8:8.8: Sā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhattena nimanteti.
ud2.8:8.9: Adhivāsetu kira, bhante, bhagavā suppavāsāya koliyadhītāya satta bhattāni saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā’”ti.
ud2.8:9.1: “Paraman”ti kho so koliyaputto suppavāsāya koliyadhītāya paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud2.8:9.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so koliyaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
ud2.8:10.1: “Suppavāsā, bhante, koliyadhītā bhagavato pāde sirasā vandati;
ud2.8:10.3: ‘suppavāsā, bhante, koliyadhītā satta vassāni gabbhaṃ dhāreti.
ud2.8:10.4: Sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā sā etarahi sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijātā.
ud2.8:10.5: Sā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhattena nimanteti.
ud2.8:10.6: Adhivāsetu kira, bhante, bhagavā suppavāsāya koliyadhītāya satta bhattāni saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghenā’”ti.
ud2.8:11.1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena buddhappamukho bhikkhusaṃgho svātanāya bhattena nimantito hoti.
ud2.8:11.2: So ca upāsako āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa upaṭṭhāko hoti.
ud2.8:11.3: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ āmantesi:
ud2.8:11.4: “ehi tvaṃ, moggallāna, yena so upāsako tenupasaṅkama;
ud2.8:11.6: ‘suppavāsā, āvuso, koliyadhītā satta vassāni gabbhaṃ dhāresi.
ud2.8:11.7: Sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā sā etarahi sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijātā.
ud2.8:11.8: Sā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṃghaṃ bhattena nimanteti.
ud2.8:11.9: Karotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā satta bhattāni, pacchā tvaṃ karissasī’ti.
ud2.8:12.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhagavato paṭissutvā yena so upāsako tenupasaṅkami;
ud2.8:12.3: “suppavāsā, āvuso, koliyadhītā satta vassāni gabbhaṃ dhāreti.
ud2.8:12.4: Sattāhaṃ mūḷhagabbhā sā etarahi sukhinī arogā arogaṃ puttaṃ vijātā.
ud2.8:12.5: Sā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ bhattena nimanteti.
ud2.8:12.6: Karotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā satta bhattāni, pacchā tvaṃ karissasī”ti.
ud2.8:13.1: “Sace me, bhante, ayyo mahāmoggallāno tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ pāṭibhogo—
ud2.8:13.2: bhogānañca jīvitassa ca saddhāya ca, karotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā satta bhattāni, pacchāhaṃ karissāmī”ti.
ud2.8:13.3: “Dvinnaṃ kho te ahaṃ, āvuso, dhammānaṃ pāṭibhogo—
ud2.8:14.1: “Sace me, bhante, ayyo mahāmoggallāno dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ pāṭibhogo—
ud2.8:14.2: bhogānañca jīvitassa ca, karotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā satta bhattāni, pacchāhaṃ karissāmī”ti.
ud2.8:15.1: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ upāsakaṃ saññāpetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
ud2.8:15.4: karotu suppavāsā koliyadhītā satta bhattāni, pacchā so karissatī”ti.
ud2.8:16.1: Atha kho suppavāsā koliyadhītā sattāhaṃ buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi, tañca dārakaṃ bhagavantaṃ vandāpesi sabbañca bhikkhusaṅghaṃ.
ud2.8:17.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto taṃ dārakaṃ etadavoca:
ud2.8:17.2: “kacci te, dāraka, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci na kiñci dukkhan”ti?
ud2.8:17.3: “Kuto me, bhante sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ, kuto yāpanīyaṃ.
ud2.8:18.2: “putto me dhammasenāpatinā saddhiṃ mantetī”ti attamanā pamuditā pītisomanassajātā ahosi.
ud2.8:18.3: Atha kho bhagavā suppavāsaṃ koliyadhītaraṃ attamanaṃ pamuditaṃ pītisomanassajātaṃ viditvā suppavāsaṃ koliyadhītaraṃ etadavoca:
ud2.8:19.1: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi:
